# HTTPCookie.AcceptPolicy.onlyFromMainDocumentDomain

**Case**

Accept cookies only from the main document domain.

## Declaration

```swift
case onlyFromMainDocumentDomain
```

## Policies

- **HTTPCookie.AcceptPolicy.always**: Accept all cookies.
- **HTTPCookie.AcceptPolicy.never**: Reject all cookies.
title: HTTPCookie.AcceptPolicy.onlyFromMainDocumentDomain
